message: When you attack black people , They call it "Racism" ,when you attack Jewish people , They call it " Anti-semetism" ,when you attack Women ,They call it " Gender discrimination " , when you attack Homosexuality ,They call it " Intolerance " ,when you attack your country ,They call "Terrorism", when you attack a Religious sect,they call it " Hate speech , But when attack at the dignity of our beloved Prophet MUHAMMAD (P.B.U.H) They call " Freedom of Expression "
